p: Male Swiss albino mice (20–25 g) roughly of same age group were procured from the Experimental Animal Care Center, College of Pharmacy, King Saud University, with the approval Clearance No. KSU-SE—19-105 (20th November 2019) by the Ethical committee. The animals used in this study were kept at 22 °C temperature by maintaining 55% humidity and light/dark (12/12 h) conditions. They were provided free access to Purina chow and drinking water ad libitum. The experimental rats were initially acclimatized for seven days prior to being used for the anti-diabetic studies.
